      • listPopup

        public static QMUIPopup listPopup(Context context,
                                  int width,
                                  int maxHeight,
                                  BaseAdapter adapter,
                                  AdapterView.OnItemClickListener onItemClickListener)
        show a list with popup
        参数:
        context - activity context
        width - the with for the popup content
        maxHeight - the max height of popup, it is scrollable if the content is higher then maxHeight
        adapter - the adapter for the list view
        onItemClickListener - the onItemClickListener for list item view
        返回:
        QMUIPopup
